Hi guys. Let me show you how to remove
the skin easily and fast

You see people picking this away like
this. Which

takes a lot of time. It can be a little bit
bitty. That's the wrong way to do it
in my view. Let me show you the right way to do it. This is dead simple.
Get a regular spoon like this. Go in
here. Push the spoon right on
to the skin and push it against the cup of your hand.
Then simply knock it out. Works every single time.
And if you want to stop the avocados from discolouring squeeze, some citrus

over the avocado. An old fashioned way of
preparing avocados in the eighties was
to cut it not quite to the end

and then fan it out. It's really tacky. I
never do it these days, but it does tend
So there you go guys, super quick but doesn't it look good,
